articles.title: Shaved ice on wheels, new florist, New Windsor Depot and more Quad-Cities business news
articles.author: LAURA YEATER
articles.summary: Tropical Sno, a mobile shaved ice trailer, has launched in Davenport, offering a variety of flavored shaved ice. New Windsor Depot has introduced a breakfast menu with skillets, omelets, and classic breakfast options. Sisters In Bloom QC, a florist and gift shop, has opened in downtown Davenport, specializing in fresh florals and wedding planning. Haven Beauty Collective in Moline has launched a pay-what-you-can haircut service, aiming for accessibility while maintaining standard pricing for other premium services.

articles.title: 44 Impressive Cleaning Products
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article introduces various household cleaning products. The products include Bioclean hard water stain remover, Affresh dishwasher tablets, The Pink Stuff cleaning paste, reusable microfiber Swiffer mop pad, stain-removing nontoxic cleaning cups, plant-based stainless steel cleaner and polish spray, Cerama Bryte cooktop cleaning kit, Goo Gone foaming spray, carpet cleaning solution, Bottle Bright cleaning tablets, Skoy Scrub, upholstery cleaner and all-natural scour paste.

articles.title: Action News Live at 3pm - August 8, 2025
articles.summary: Instagram is introducing new features. The specifics of the new features are not detailed.

articles.title: .YOU Domains Are Now Open for Pre-Order!
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: The .you extension is launching soon, and pre-orders are now open. General Availability Pre-Orders are available.

articles.title: Nectar Mattress Sale: Save Up To 62% Ahead Of Labor Day
articles.author: Maya Gandara
articles.summary: Nectar is offering an early Labor Day sale with discounts up to 50% on mattresses and 66% on bundles. All four of Nectar's mattress models, including Classic, Premier, Luxe and Ultra, have been revamped for 2025. Nectar is also offering sales on bed frames, bases, and adjustable bundles.

articles.title: Street tacos, classy coffee, Mexican/Asian fusion, lactose-free desserts
articles.summary: KENS 5 requires users to download the KENS 5 app to stream their content on phones. The KENS 5 app enables streaming of KENS 5.

articles.title: How Expert Google Ads Services Can Skyrocket Your Business Revenue
articles.author: Oki Bin Oki
articles.summary: Expert Google Ads services improve ad performance through in-depth account audits, keyword strategies, A/B testing, conversion tracking, and budget optimization. These services offer keyword research, ad copywriting, and landing page optimization for various ad types including Search, Display, Shopping, and YouTube Ads. Google Ads provides strategic value to businesses.

articles.title: Discover Charming Homes for Sale in Steinwiesen, Bavaria: Your Dream Property Awaits!
articles.summary: A popular online platform introduced a new advanced filter button to refine search results and improve overall user experience. This feature allows users to access a suite of advanced filtering options, signaling a commitment to providing users with increasingly tailored search capabilities. The update is currently available to all users and is expected to be a key component in improving platform engagement and user satisfaction.

articles.title: 9mobile rebrands as T2 to strengthen market share
articles.author: Wale Gbadebo
articles.summary: 9mobile has rebranded as T2 with a renewed focus on advancing Nigeria's digital economy. T2 is committing to a business model rooted in innovation and driven by data and is evolving into a fully digital operator. This shift will enable the company to roll out new products faster and deliver deeply personalised services using artificial intelligence and advanced analytics.

articles.title: 23 Everyday Problems Solved by Surprisingly Practical Inventions
articles.summary: Doppel Miniature Transporter merges physical miniatures with digital overlays for tabletop gaming, offering character animations and custom audio effects. WHYTRIP Modular Luggage provides customizable storage for organized travel, featuring mobile desktop functionality. Lring 2 integrates AI for real-time translation, gesture controls, and voice transcription, packed into a sleek ring. Aurora 20-in-1 Docking Station offers 128 terabytes of storage and high-speed data transfers. UniFy Drive UT2 offers a portable NAS storage solution with one-click backup and AI features. The AK K1 acts as your personal AI trainer. The Max Pump 3 is a 2-in-1 rechargeable air pump for campers. The Hover X1 Pro and Pro Max is an 8K flying action camera. Boar Drop bridges the gap between board sports and immersive gaming. The Newtral Freedom X adapts to individual needs and is a customizable ergonomic experience. The Ti-coolX employs titanium and is a premium cooling solution. The Mind 1 is an ultra-compact device that runs Android 15 overlaid with AIOS. The Lunar 2-in-1 Keyboard and Mini PC blends a high-performance computer with portable design. The Carbon AI LED Backpack personalizes expression. The Alpgali All-Weather Jacket is packed with over 30 features. The SHDW 45 is waterproof and adapts to both mountain trails or navigating bustling city streets. The Pico Torch is a keychain-ready flood light that throws out 215 lumens. The Xway is adjustable and versatile for various conditions. The Kiko Bay P1 promotes sustainability with zero waste. The Difold Origami Cup changes this narrative with its foldable design for easy storage. The Defi automates dose logging. The Spinn CW2 keeps your devices safe and dry. The KISS Series modular sling bag adapts to any active lifestyle.

articles.title: Salesforce (Heroku) Named a Leader in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Cloud-Native Application Platforms (Salesforce Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Salesforce (Heroku) has been recognized as a leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Cloud-Native Application Platforms. The company focuses on simplifying the development and deployment of AI applications to improve customer satisfaction and drive business growth.

articles.title: DJI launches first robot cleaner with drone-level obstacle avoidance system
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: DJI launched a vacuum cleaning robot. The robot features drone-level obstacle avoidance capabilities.

articles.title: Wild and wonderful new foods, drinks debut at the 2025 Iowa State Fair
articles.author: Elijah Decious
articles.summary: Several companies introduced new food and beverage products at the Iowa State Fair. Saigonais Cuisine launched the Saigon Lobster Bomb, while Destination Grille presented The Butcher's Donut. Barn Town Brewing introduced the State Fair Nerds Beer and Bacon Box debuted the Double Bacon Cheeseburger Balls. These offerings, which range from lobster-based snacks to custom brews, showcase a variety of flavors and innovative approaches to fair food.

articles.title: Lithios Beverages Drives Excitement in NYC with Successful Sampling Events and Times Square Billboard
articles.author: Drink Lithios
articles.summary: Lithios Beverages is preparing to launch its Brain Fuel+ Hydration Drink Mix. The drink contains minerals, electrolytes, Vitamin C, and B12, along with ingredients like GeniusPure® Alpha GPC and SalidroPure® Salidrosides, to support focus and energy. Consumers can sign up online to receive 10% off their first order.

articles.title: Want to reach Portland locals? Here's the easiest way to advertise right now
articles.summary: 6AM City introduces its Self-Service Ad Portal, designed for easy advertising with local impact in Portland. The portal allows users to browse, purchase, and schedule local ads, offering options for branded content, digital display ads, and social media promotions. They also offer full-service campaigns for those who prefer a concierge-level support.

articles.title: Expanding Global Market Presence, smart Announces New Zealand Launch of the smart #1 and #3
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: smart has launched the smart #1, a premium compact urban SUV, and the smart #3, an SUV coupe, in New Zealand in partnership with Armstrong's. The smart #1 is available in PRO+, Premium, and BRABUS variants.

articles.title: Want to reach Northern Virginia locals? Here's the easiest way to advertise right now
articles.summary: 6AM City has launched a Self-Service Ad Portal, enabling businesses to create and manage advertising campaigns. The portal offers options like branded content, text ads, digital display ads (email headers, banner ads), and social media posts (Instagram/Facebook). Pricing varies based on the ad type and reach.

articles.title: Quad-jaw 11-to-1 multitool stashes best feature a click away
articles.author: New Atlas
articles.summary: Nextool launched the W4, a multitool adjustable wrench. The W4 includes 10 extra features inside its splittable handle, including multipurpose pliers.

articles.title: Trump Turnberry offers discounted green fee for local residents
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: Trump Turnberry has launched a new 'Scottish Resident' rate.

articles.title: Phunware Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
articles.author: Phunware
articles.summary: Phunware debuted hospitality AI features, including the AI Concierge and Guest Services Agent, at the 2025 Hospitality Industry Technology Exposition and Conference (HITEC®). The company also released Map Editor 3.0, which represents a major upgrade to its Multiscreen-as-a-Service platform.

articles.title: E-commerce giant celebrates 10 years of serving S'pore
articles.summary: Shopee is integrating AI to enhance the online shopping experience for both sellers and buyers. They launched AI-powered tools, including Review Summaries (condenses thousands of reviews into clear highlights) and an AI Shopping Assistant (curates personalized product recommendations). Shopee also provides comprehensive support to businesses, including backend operations and enabling them to tap into new opportunities through e-commerce.

articles.title: I tested supermarket pre-mixed martinis… flavour punch from tasty £6 winner nails classic cocktail & is great value too
articles.author: Helena Nicklin
articles.summary: Aldi's Infusionist Passion Fruit Martini is a well-priced ready-to-sip cocktail. Morrisons offers a Passion Fruit Martini with a real flavor punch and glam packaging. ASDA's Extra Special Passion Fruit Martini, despite its unsophisticated bottle, delivers a tropical and exotic taste with a punchy ABV.

articles.title: Terra Kaffe Expands From Single Product, Introduces Compact Automatic Espresso Machine, Demi
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The Demi, a new product, is introduced as half the size and significantly less expensive than the TK-02 model. This suggests a new offering from a company focusing on a more compact and affordable product.

articles.title: What Does OpenAI's GPT-5 Mean In The Race For AI Model Supremacy?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: GPT-5 aims to be a single, smarter AI system. It blends reasoning, multimodality, cost efficiency, and usability into one.

articles.title: OpenAI releases ChatGPT-5 as AI race accelerates
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: OpenAI released a new generation.

articles.title: Wendy's looks to simplify its marketing calendar
articles.author: Ron Ruggless
articles.summary: Wendy's is launching new chicken tenders with six new sauces, including sweet chili and a signature sauce. They are also introducing a new cold brew coffee with cold foam and caffeinated cherry-limeade and pineapple-citrus 'refresher' energy drinks. These beverage innovations aim to boost breakfast sales and cater to consumer preferences for cold brew coffee.

articles.title: 9mobile rebrands as T2, declares bold new future
articles.author: Royal Ibeh
articles.summary: 9mobile has rebranded to T2, launching a new digital lifestyle brand with a focus on powering Nigeria's digital economy. T2 is committing to a business model rooted in innovation, evolving into a fully digital operator to roll out new products faster and deliver personalized services using AI and advanced analytics. The company aims to empower customers with real-time support and simplified processes.

articles.title: Nang Robot Expands Product Line With New 3.3 Litre Tanks With Delivery Across Melbourne
articles.author: Nang Robot
articles.summary: Nang Robot introduced new 3.3 Litre / 2.1kg (net) charger tanks to its product lineup. This expansion provides customers with more options and convenience, enhancing their experience with the company's lightning-speed service and immediate delivery across the greater Melbourne region.

articles.title: Labor Day sales have started early, with 50% off mattresses and 63% off bundle sets from Nectar
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: Nectar is offering early Labor Day sales with significant discounts on mattresses and bundles. The Premium Memory Foam Mattress is available at a reduced price, offering over $1,000 in savings and features a cooling design with double pressure relief. Select bundles, such as the Bamboo Bed and Mattress Bundle, are also heavily discounted, providing savings of over $2,000.

articles.title: Latest Galaxy S21 Leak Reveals Samsung's Surprising Decision
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to introduce a new design feature. Samsung is also launching the Galaxy S21 earlier than anticipated.

articles.title: The Magic Wand Is 57 Years Old and Still Our Favorite Vibrator
articles.author: Dominique Pariso
articles.summary: Vibratex has introduced two new versions of the Magic Wand: the Magic Wand Waterproof, which allows for up to 30 minutes of playtime in the bath or shower, and the Magic Wand Micro, a tiny, travel-ready bullet that packs the power of the original. These new releases demonstrate the brand's ability to innovate while maintaining the intensity and effectiveness of the original Magic Wand.

articles.title: ChatGPT-5: OpenAI's Next-Gen AI is Coming Soon!
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched GPT-5, a new AI model with enhanced reasoning, multimodality, and personalization features. It is available in different versions (full-powered, Mini, and Nano) to accommodate diverse user needs and hardware capabilities. Paying subscribers can customize the chatbot's interface and personality, with integration with Gmail and Calendar for contextually relevant assistance.

articles.title: This is your last chance to get the Dyson V8 Absolute vacuum at $160 off with free shipping
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a promotional deal on its V8 Absolute vacuum during Dyson Week, discounting it from $519.99 to $359.99. The Dyson V8 Absolute features swappable heads for different floor types, up to 40 minutes of runtime, and a hygienic bin-emptying mechanism.

articles.title: Kustomer: $30 Million Series B Raised For Customer Experience Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Kustomer's platform launched AI Agents for Reps and AI Agents for Customers. AI Agents for Reps boost productivity through automated responses and information retrieval. AI Agents for Customers handle inquiries across channels and automate workflows with backend systems such as ERPs and CRMs.

articles.title: From Side Hustles to Global Brands: How Entrepreneurs Scale Remotely
articles.summary: AonMeetings provides enterprise-grade video conferencing tools, including clear video, built-in scheduling, and secure sessions, at a fraction of the cost for remote teams. The platform aims to facilitate communication and collaboration for businesses operating without a traditional office setting.

articles.title: Trump Mobile pushes T1 Phone release to October. What we know about the phone, service
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Trump Organization's Trump Mobile is launching a new cellular service, featuring the '47 Plan' for $47.45/month with 5G service, along with the T1 Phone. The T1 Phone, priced at $499 with a $100 down payment, will have 256GB of storage, Android 15, AI face unlocking, and is now expected to be available in October after a launch delay.

articles.title: POP MART May Seem Like It JUST Took Over the World with Labubus, But Its Power Has Risen for 15 Years
articles.summary: POP MART showcased global debuts of several product lines at San Diego Comic-Con, including Nyota, Peach Riot, DUCKOO, MEGA SPACE MOLLY, Star Wars Bobble Heads, Chucky Blind Boxes, and Labubu.  Nyota launched in late 2023/2024 and became a best seller. Chucky Blind Boxes, POP MART's first collection with the horror doll, will be available for Halloween.

articles.title: He's Back: Khairul Aming Launches Hot New Product After 3-Month Hiatus
articles.author: Syazwan Bahri
articles.summary: Khairul Aming launched Rendang Nyet Berapi, his third product, with 70,000 units available at launch. The product launch was promoted on TikTok and follows the success of his previous products, Sambal Nyet Berapi and Dendeng Nyet Berapi.

articles.title: Coors Seltzer Launches With A Plan To Save America's Waterways'One Drink At A Time
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Coors launched Coors Seltzer, a hard seltzer brand, at the end of August. Marketing support for Coors Seltzer is ramping up in September.

articles.title: Does My Vagina Need a Skin-Care Routine?
articles.author: Carol Lee
articles.summary: Mienne, a luxury body-care brand, launched a serum in this year meant to facilitate sex while hydrating, soothing, and softening the skin around genitals. Luna Daily's the Everywhere Wash is also mentioned as a go-to product for feeling extra fresh.

articles.title: OWYN Protein Shake Review (2025): Only What You Need to Know
articles.author: Chelsea Rae Bourgeois
articles.summary: OWYN introduces its Plant-Based Protein Shake, a vegan-friendly beverage containing 20 grams of protein per serving from pea and pumpkin seed protein, available in flavors like Dark Chocolate and Vanilla. A 12-pack costs $36.99, with the shakes being dairy-free and gluten-free. It offers a convenient, ready-to-drink option for those seeking a plant-based protein source and is available through OWYN's retail page, Amazon, Target, and Walmart.

articles.title: I Foraged the Internet for Mushroom Brown
articles.author: Erin Schwartz
articles.summary: Baserange released its most recent collection with Mara brown color. ZN Ali offers a suiting wool shirt with a detachable scarf in mushroomy brown and red plaid. Are Studio sells a net bag with leather offcut trim. Nike offers track pants. Mater sells smoky pine soap.

articles.title: Walmart goes on tour, rolls out ‘FYP on Wheels' to woo Gen Z shoppers
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Walmart is planning to launch a novel store format, referred to as 'your FYP on wheels,' which offers products tailored to individual customer preferences. The new store format targets attracting younger demographics.

articles.title: Suntide Mimosa review: The convenient way to start your day drinking
articles.author: Christian D'Andrea
articles.summary: Suntide introduces pre-made canned mimosas, available in Classic Mimosa and Peach Mimosa flavors. The Classic Mimosa offers a blend of sparkling wine and citrus, while the Peach Mimosa provides a sweeter, fruitier alternative with a smoother mix of peach and wine.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: Here's Where to Buy the Best Folding Smartphone In 2025
articles.author: Rudie Obias
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, a new foldable Android smartphone, available at multiple retailers. The device features a crisp display, long battery life (over 70 hours per charge), impressive cameras, and AI features. Starting at $1,999.99, it's available in multiple colors including a Samsung.com exclusive Mint color.

articles.title: Tech Review: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: NZME
articles.summary: Samsung is associated with the Galaxy Z Fold 7. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is a product associated with Samsung.

articles.title: Aldi launches £5.99 cleansing balm to rival Elemis Pro-collagen version
articles.author: Stephanie Bateman
articles.summary: Aldi has launched its new Lacura Cleansing Balm priced at £5.99. Aldi is also reintroducing its Marine Skincare Collection, which includes products such as Marine Day Cream, Marine Mask, Marine Facial Oil, Marine Moisturising Essence, and Marine Facial Cleanser, all available at significantly lower prices than comparable Elemis products.

articles.title: How to Make Better eCommerce Videos with AI Voiceovers Using CapCut PC
articles.author: Pulse Mix
articles.summary: CapCut PC introduces its Text-to-Speech (TTS) AI tool designed for e-commerce businesses to create professional voiceovers for product videos and other content without needing recording equipment or voice actors. This tool offers features like various voice types, custom controls for pitch and speed, and multilingual support, enabling businesses to produce consistent, high-quality content efficiently and cost-effectively for platforms like Shopify, Amazon, and social media. The TTS tool also helps businesses with features such as product demos, social media content, and customer service videos.

articles.title: My Scalp Can Get Next-Level Flaky—These 10 Products Keep Dryness in Check
articles.author: Danielle Jackson
articles.summary: The article reviews haircare products for addressing scalp issues, featuring brands like Cécred and Prose. The reviewer highlights a Cécred scrub with tea tree oil, salicylic acid shampoos, and moisturizing conditioners. Customized scalp oils from Prose and squalane-forward serums are also used for moisturizing and soothing the scalp.

articles.title: Instagram launches map feature that allows users to show their current location
articles.summary: Instagram has launched a new feature that displays the user's current location.

articles.title: My new ‘caravan toy' is great if you're holidaying in one this summer – it's light, easy to pack & feeds the kids quick
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: Ninja launched the Crispi portable air fryer in the UK in March 2025. This lightweight and compact appliance is designed for small spaces like caravans and campervans. It is currently on sale on Ninja Kitchen UK for £149.

articles.title: Moto g86 Power: Best Budget Smartphone Gift for Raksha Bandhan 2025
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola launched the moto g86 Power on July 30, 2025, a mid-range 5G mobile phone featuring a vegan leather design, a 6.7-inch 1.5K pOLED screen, a 50MP OIS Sony camera, and a 6,720 mAh battery. The phone is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chip and supports 13 5G bands. It is available for purchase on Easy EMIs through the Bajaj Finserv EMI Network.

articles.title: This bestselling dryer vent cleaning kit can help prevent dryer fires — and it's on sale for under $20
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: Holikme has introduced the Dryer Vent Cleaner Kit, designed for easy removal of lint buildup in dryers. This Amazon's Choice product boasts a 4.3-star rating and positive reviews, with users reporting improved dryer efficiency and reduced drying time.

articles.title: How R/GA Used AI to Make an 'Impossible' Ad
articles.author: Brittaney Kiefer
articles.summary: Google's generative video model, Veo, was launched and utilized by R/GA to create an experimental ad for Moncler. The short film, titled 'From the Mountains to the City,' demonstrated Veo's capabilities and sparked conversation within the creative industry, highlighting a novel approach to filmmaking.

articles.title: Walton Goggins gives new Doritos flavour a spicy welcome
articles.author: Mark Dishman
articles.summary: Doritos launched its new flavor, Golden Sriracha, in the US market with a significant marketing campaign. The campaign features a 1970s-style 'adult' film parody starring White Lotus actor Walton Goggins, emphasizing the flavor as 'spicy… but not too spicy'.

articles.title: Long-term Update: Ford Puma ST-Line feels premium, right down to the doors
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: The Ford Puma ST-Line Vignale, priced at R617,500, features a 1.0-litre three-cylinder EcoBoost engine producing 92kW and 170Nm, paired with a seven-speed dual-clutch transmission. Its premium features include quilted leather seats with a massage function, a 10-speaker B&O premium sound system, and Ford's Sync 3 system via an 8.0-inch touchscreen.

articles.title: 'Powerful' Hoover robot vacuum price drop makes it £1,000 cheaper than Dyson
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Hoover has launched a deal on its Robot Vacuum Cleaner, cutting the price to £119 using the code ROBOT-DEAL. The vacuum features home mapping, smart navigation, and 4,000 suction, and it maps a home in less than 10 minutes, allowing users to set personalized cleaning routines via an app. There is also a Hoover 2-in-1 Robot vacuum and mop hybrid available for £299.

articles.title: Service Update for EEA and UK Customers: Yahoo! Japan Transition to Content Writer Role with Improved Article Delivery
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Archyde is prioritizing the delivery of full articles and contextual information sourced from Yahoo! Japan for its Japanese language learning resources, providing a richer experience with example sentences and cultural nuances. Archyde has also integrated alternative Japanese dictionary and translation resources, including Weblio, to mitigate API disruptions and ensure redundancy, along with improvements in translation accuracy by leveraging contextual information from full articles.

articles.title: Action News at 5am - August 8, 2025
articles.summary: Instagram is rolling out new features. These updates represent changes and improvements to the platform's services.

articles.title: Buying a used hatchback? I've driven 47 used hatchback cars – this BMW 1 Series is by far a standout
articles.author: Lawrie Jones
articles.summary: The article reviews the BMW 1 Series, highlighting different models. The latest 2025 model of the BMW 1 Series M135 xDrive features updated and improved external styling and a powerful 2.0-litre turbocharged four-cylinder engine delivering 301 bhp.

articles.title: 50 Mundane Products That Will Actually Rock Your World
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Several new products and services are highlighted. SweatBlock introduces antiperspirant wipes for hyperhidrosis. Built launches "Puff Protein Bars," a protein-rich snack. Monday Haircare introduces Dry Shampoo with keratin treatment and a gardenia scent. Medicube unveils "Zero Pore" Pads for sebum control and exfoliation. PanOxyl introduces Antimicrobial Hydrating Acne Creamy Wash for sensitive skin. Qualify offers chocolate brownie protein powder. Rael launches "Miracle Invisible Spot Cover" Pimple Patches with thin edges. Gold Bond introduces firming neck and chest cream.

articles.title: Beyond Suction, How This Vacuum Sets An Example For Other Brands
articles.author: Scott Kramer
articles.summary: Dreame, a seven-year-old company, launched the Z30 Cordless Stick Vacuum. The Z30 features enhanced blue light dust detection, robust suction, up to 90 minutes of runtime, and various attachments including a HEPA filter and pet brush. Initial customer reviews are positive, highlighting its battery life, suction, and dust detection capabilities.

articles.title: Starlink arrives in Israel: How much does Musk's satellite internet cost and what does it offer?
articles.author: NIV LILIEN
articles.summary: A company launched a Hebrew-language website for preorders in early August. It began providing services in the country on Thursday.

articles.title: Yocan Lux 2.0 Series Launches: Precision Control Meets Smarter Vaping
articles.summary: Yocan has launched the Lux 2.0 Series, an update to their bestselling battery platform. The Lux 2.0 retains the top-twist voltage control and introduces a first-ever OLED smart display and precision-engineered preheat system.

articles.title: Walmart is selling a $928 laptop for $373 that's 'very sleek'
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Walmart offers the Auusda Business Laptop for sale at a budget-friendly price, presenting an upgrade option for consumers seeking laptop replacements.

articles.title: Google Stock Falls: AI Search Threatens Dominance
articles.summary: Microsoft is aggressively integrating AI into Bing, posing a challenge to Google's dominance in search. Google is responding with 'Project Magi,' an effort to integrate generative AI into Google Search, including an AI chat tool to transform search results. This shift represents a move towards conversational, personalized search experiences and 'answer engines'.

articles.title: This Carry-on Friendly Non-Aerosol Dry Shampoo Is Saving My Summer Hair
articles.author: Lauren Anderson
articles.summary: Hairitage launched Working Overtime Dry Shampoo Powder, a non-aerosol, travel-friendly hair powder, available at Walmart for $9. The dry shampoo refreshes hair by absorbing oil and adding volume, suitable for all hair textures and contains green tea and moringa extracts purify the scalp and help keep hair soft between washes.

articles.title: Toll Brothers Unveils Lyondale Meadows, a Luxury Home Community Coming to Newtown, PA
articles.author: Timothy Alexander
articles.summary: Toll Brothers, Inc. announced plans for Lyondale Meadows, a new high-end residential community of 45 estate homes in Newtown, Pennsylvania, scheduled to open for sales in fall 2025. These single-family homes will feature open-concept designs, ranging from 3,520 to over 5,000 square feet, and will be customizable through Toll Brothers' Design Studio.

articles.title: Burgrill Bottles Its Signature OG Sauce for the First Time
articles.author: Mansi Praharaj
articles.summary: Burgrill has launched its iconic OG Sauce as a bottled product, making it available for purchase online and in select retail outlets. This launch allows customers to enjoy the sauce, previously exclusive to Burgrill's burgers, at home in various culinary applications.

articles.title: Eyewitness News at 6am - August 8, 2025
articles.summary: Instagram is introducing new features to its platform.

articles.title: Check out Huawei's extra-wide flip phone.
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Huawei introduced the Pura X, an extra-wide flip phone, this week. The Pura X has a unique form factor that opens to the side for a wider main display, running Android apps on HarmonyOS Next.

articles.title: Moto G86 Power 5G Unboxing First Impression: 18 Hazar Mein Best Option!
articles.author: Produced by: प्रेम त्रिपाठी
articles.summary: Moto G86 Power 5G is introduced with first impressions suggesting it's the best option in the 18,000 price range.

articles.title: Is Nothing making a foldable phone?
articles.summary: Nothing is potentially developing a clamshell foldable phone, as suggested by a video featuring the company's India head handling an unnamed gadget. This device, a departure from Nothing's usual design, could mark their entry into the competitive foldable phone market dominated by brands like Samsung, Motorola, and OPPO.

articles.title: Brand Street Integrated launches BSI FLASH, a new division for product sampling
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Brand Street Integrated launched BSI FLASH, a new unit dedicated to product sampling and consumer engagement across India. BSI FLASH will focus on experience-led product trials in sectors such as FMCG, health, wellness, personal care, and beverages, aiming to create brand discovery through strategic sampling solutions.

articles.title: 7 Vacuums Under $200 That Reviewers Say Perform Just Like A Dyson
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: Several companies offer cordless stick vacuums as alternatives to Dyson, with models from SunSare, Chebio, Trucozie, Shark, and Levoit highlighted. These vacuums boast features like long runtimes, powerful suction, specialized filtration systems, and various attachments for diverse cleaning needs, often at a more affordable price point. User reviews favorably compare them to Dyson products.

articles.title: Post-Event Story: National AI Prompt Design Challenge Philippines
articles.author: Journal Online
org: Analytics and AI Association of the Philippines
articles.summary: Straits Interactive, in partnership with the Analytics and AI Association of the Philippines, organized the National AI Prompt Design Challenge, showcasing AI applications like Export Buddy, BldgGuide PH, and Kuya FReady. The challenge demonstrated the accessibility of AI development using Straits Interactive's Capabara platform, enabling non-technical users to build AI tools. These AI tools help Filipinos with exporting, building code compliance, and government ID applications respectively.

articles.title: The best Samsung Galaxy Note 20 cases 2020: Protect Samsung's latest flagship
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy Note 20, the latest phablet in its line. It is described as a super-impressive device.

articles.title: Porsche Design Acer Book RS review: Racing pedigree or distracting body kit
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Acer is launching a new product with Porsche Design, incorporating a standout design language. This launch is considered a surprise, bringing unique design elements to Acer's offerings.

articles.title: Oppo says its Qualcomm Snapdragon 888-based phone will be a new Find X
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Qualcomm launched its new Snapdragon 888 flagship phone platform. Oppo was mentioned in connection with the launch.

articles.title: Put Baby Yoda on your wrist with Vodafone and Disney's Neo smartwatch
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Vodafone and Disney have collaborated to launch the Neo smartwatch. The smartwatch features Baby Yoda.

articles.title: Ball Corporation launches $750m senior notes offering
articles.author: Global Data
articles.summary: Ball Corporation partnered with Açaí Motion to introduce a new line of sustainable aluminium cans, certified by the Aluminium Stewardship Initiative. This collaboration represents a new product offering from both companies.

articles.title: Waterproof Kitchen Door Singapore – Perfect for Humid Spaces
articles.summary: Andigitallock offers a wide range of kitchen door options designed for HDBs, condos, and private homes in Singapore. Their doors are built with high-quality, waterproof materials and come in sliding, swing, or custom designs with professional installation services.

articles.title: 42 Swaps For More Expensive Products That Are So Good, You'll Want To Cry Happy Tears
articles.author: Jenae Sitzes
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduced the Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen with SPF 35, a clear gel sunscreen that doubles as a blurring primer. E.l.f. also released the Camo Liquid Blush, known for its pigmentation. Nyx launched a setting spray ensuring makeup lasts up to 16 hours.

articles.title: Everything points out that ChatGPT-5 will be released today. Leaked model descriptions and OpenAI invites us to a presentation
articles.summary: OpenAI is speculated to be launching ChatGPT-5, a new AI model, on August 8th. The model is expected to include versions like GPT-5, GPT-5-mini, GPT-5-nano, and GPT-5-chat, each designed for specific applications such as multi-stage tasks, low-cost applications, and advanced conversations.

articles.title: Aldi Bankside reopens near Warrington town centre after refurbishment
articles.author: Nathan Okell
articles.summary: Aldi has reopened its Bankside store on Liverpool Road after completing a makeover. The upgrades include increased chiller space with energy-efficient fridge doors, an additional room for Specialbuys, and redesigned health and beauty and bakery sections. These changes aim to improve the shopping experience and create a more sustainable store.

articles.title: Milton's Walmart Neighborhood Market holds grand opening
articles.author: Madison De Vito
articles.summary: Milton's new Walmart Neighborhood Market launched on August 6th. A grand opening event celebrated the store's new location.

articles.title: Smart launches new mobile brand KIQ aimed at Gen Z users to regain market leadership
articles.author: Darwin G. Amojelar
articles.summary: Smart Communications Inc. has launched KIQ, a new mobile brand specifically designed for Gen Z customers in the Philippines. This app-based service offers personalized digital telecom experiences and features like QR-less eSIM activation. The company aims to increase average revenue per user with this new offering.

articles.title: Expectations high for OpenAI's GPT-5, an upgrade to ChatGPT
articles.author: MATT O'BRIEN
articles.summary: OpenAI released GPT-5, the fifth generation of its ChatGPT AI technology. Microsoft will incorporate GPT-5 into its AI assistant, Copilot. The new model is available to anyone with a free ChatGPT account and is focused on coding and safety improvements.

articles.title: OpenAI Rolls Out ChatGPT-5 Along With GPT-5-Mini And GPT-5-Nano; Check Features, Pricing, And How To Use It
articles.author: Ankur Mishra
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched its latest language model, GPT-5, which is now available to both free and paid ChatGPT users. It brings enhanced performance, accuracy, and new features such as image understanding, voice conversations, and improved emotional awareness. OpenAI offers different pricing plans for GPT-5, including free, Plus ($20/month), Pro ($200/month), Team (from $25/user/month), and Enterprise (custom pricing) options.

articles.title: Bumrah fronts 15-minute laundry shift in Surf Excel campaign
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Hindustan Unilever (HUL) launched Surf Excel Matic Express, a detergent designed for short washing cycles, targeting fast-paced urban lifestyles. The product comes in two variants and is supported by a marketing campaign featuring Jasprit Bumrah. The detergent is formulated with HUL's Pro-S Technology, ensuring effective cleaning even in short cycles and is complemented by Whirlpool's washing machine technology.

articles.title: What is the difference between bio and non-bio laundry detergent?
articles.author: Amelia Morgan
articles.summary: The Fairy Non-Bio range is recognized as the best laundry detergent for sensitive skin, receiving dermatological approval. Smol detergents are recommended for effective cleaning at low temperatures, with Catherine Green from Smol providing laundry tips, including using their detergent at 20°C for stain removal.

articles.title: What is the difference between bio and non-bio laundry detergent?
articles.author: Amelia Morgan
articles.summary: Smol explains bio detergents contain enzymes to break down stains effectively at lower temperatures. Fairy Non-Bio range, dermatologically approved, is recommended for sensitive skin and is considered the best laundry detergent brand for that purpose.

articles.title: Estelar Cosmetics India Private Limited – Redefining Beauty, Authentically and Unapologetically - ED Times
articles.author: Brand Voice
articles.summary: Estelar Cosmetics launched in India with vegan and cruelty-free beauty products tailored to Indian skin tones. The brand offers liquid matte lipsticks, pH sticks, blushes, and compact powders and is available on Amazon, Flipkart, and Myntra, soon expanding to Nykaa.

articles.title: Suzuki Jimny's electric counterpart enters the European market
articles.author: Radoslav Slavchev
articles.summary: Baojun Yep, a compact electric crossover, has been launched in the European market with a starting price of 499,000 crowns (approximately $23,500). The vehicle features a 300km range, 10.25-inch screens, and is available in a rear-wheel-drive version, with a more powerful all-wheel-drive version and the five-door Yep Plus expected in the future.

articles.title: 'Game changer' anti-hair loss serum loved by This Morning's Lisa Snowdon now under £50
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: NIOXIN has launched the Anti-Hair Loss Hair Growth Serum, which is formulated to reduce hair breakage and fall out. It contains ingredients like caffeine, lauric acid, and niacinamide. Lookfantastic offers the serum with a 20% discount, priced at £46, and clinical studies have shown improved hair anchorage for 93% of participants within eight weeks.

articles.title: The Inventors Of These 33 Things Are So Genius
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article highlights new product introductions such as Essence Lash Princess mascara that delivers dramatic lashes, Owala stainless-steel water bottle with a double-spout built-in straw, and Wet & Forget shower cleaner that eliminates scrubbing, plus Sol de Janeiro lotion with pistachio, salted caramel, and vanilla scent for smoothness and hydration to your skin.

articles.title: Smart launches KiQ, a local app-based telco brand with flexible usage plans
articles.author: Victor Barreiro Jr.
articles.summary: Smart Communications launched KiQ, a new app-based telecommunications brand targeting younger users. KiQ offers personalized mobile plans, eSIM activation via an app, and prioritized network experience in high-traffic areas.

articles.title: Mahindra Vision S teased again, debut soon: All you need to know
articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.summary: Mahindra is preparing to unveil the Vision S concept SUV, expected to preview the brand's first electric iteration of the Scorpio N. Alongside the Vision S, Mahindra will also unveil the Vision SXT, a rugged electric pickup truck. These models showcase Mahindra's future direction for electric mobility.

articles.title: Drake is selling a scented candle that smells like... Drake
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Drake is launching a product to make your house smell like him, potentially a scented candle or home fragrance.

articles.title: Smart launches Philippines' first app-based mobile brand KiQ
articles.author: Dexter Barro Ii
articles.summary: Smart Communications Inc. launched KiQ, a new app-based mobile brand designed for Gen Z, offering personalized data allocation, call and text options, plan validity, and number selection. The service includes prioritized network experience and QR-less eSIM activation via the KiQ app available on Google Play Store or Apple App Store.

articles.title: Reports: US vegan egg brand Just Egg hatches UK launch
articles.summary: Just Egg, an American vegan egg brand, has launched its product in the UK, marking the company's European debut. This launch represents the introduction of Just Egg to the UK market.

articles.title: Denza B8 SUV could arrive in SA alongside B5 next year
articles.author: Ruan De Ridder
articles.summary: Denza, owned by BYD, is launching the B8, an export model of the Fangchengbao Bao 8, in Middle Eastern and African markets. The B8 features a plug-in powertrain using a 2.0-liter turbo-petrol engine with a 36.8kWh Blade battery pack, producing a combined output of 550kW and reaching 0-100 km/h in 4.8 seconds. The launch is expected to start in the third quarter of the year, with South Africa potentially receiving the B8 after the B5 model.

articles.title: SPAM Sushi Musubi Mobile Activation
articles.author: 노블의 주식 일정 재료
articles.summary: The SPAM brand introduced the SPAM Musubi Mobile in Los Angeles on August 7, 2025, to celebrate National Musubi Day on August 8. This activation was photographed by AP Content Services for SPAM.

articles.title: Life-like robots for sale to the public as China opens new store
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: Robot Mall launched in Beijing offering over 100 types of products, including mechanical butlers and human-like replicas of Albert Einstein. The store sells humanoid and consumer-oriented robots, providing services such as sales, spare parts, and maintenance.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: T.J. Maxx relocating within Clinton to Guilford Commons
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T.J. Maxx is opening 6 new stores, including one in Clinton Town Center relocating to Guilford Commons, set to open on August 21. T-Mobile is recognized as America's best mobile network in the US, based on Ookla Speedtest results.

articles.title: X-Design Tops Product Hunt Charts
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: X-Design, an AI product photo editor for small online sellers, launched and was voted #1 Product of the Day on Product Hunt. The product helps users generate high-quality visuals and includes features like background removal, photo enhancement and realistic scene generation. The company is also planning to launch new features, including auto-generated lighting and smart agents.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5: The Perfect Festive Gift That Blends Flagship Power with Everyday Practicality
articles.author: IE Online
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the Nord 5 smartphone, featuring a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 processor, a 144Hz OLED display, and AI-powered features. It is priced starting at ₹31,999 and targets students, travelers, and professionals with its blend of performance, style, and smart functionality. The device includes features like AI Plus Mind, AI Search, and high-quality cameras, making it a premium and practical gift option.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Residents urged to secure vehicles after break-ins reported
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile is promoting its mobile network, claiming it's the best in the US based on Ookla Speedtest results. The company has invested billions in its network infrastructure, connecting big cities and small towns.

articles.title: Qualcomm Details Impressive Snapdragon 888 5G Performance And Experience Gains
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Snapdragon 888 5G will provide a huge generational lift in performance for premium mobile devices. The company claims significant gains for user experiences in AI, computational photography, gaming, and connectivity with this product.

articles.title: Report: Denza tipped to bring flagship B8 SUV to South Africa
articles.author: Charl Bosch
articles.summary: Denza, owned by BYD, is releasing the B8, an export version of the Fangchengbao Bao 8, equipped with a plug-in hybrid powertrain, advanced technology like a LiDAR system, and optional drone package. The B8 is confirmed for South Africa and is expected to launch in African and Middle Eastern markets.

articles.title: M&S warns popular item will be axed from UK shelves in days
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: M&S launched the Strawberry and Creme Sandwich, a unique sweet treat inspired by Japanese sweet sandos, featuring strawberries and whipped cream cheese between sweetened bread. This limited-edition item, launched on June 25th, is now nearing the end of its availability in UK stores.

articles.title: Luton Technologies (CEO Lee Se-young), an artificial intelligence (AI) service platform company, ann..
articles.author: Lee Hojun
articles.summary: Luton Technologies announced they are providing OpenAI's newly released GPT-5 large language model for free and unlimited use through their app and web service. This service offers access to GPT-5 without usage limits, building upon Luton's previous offering of free and unlimited GPT-4 access.

articles.title: Woolworths shoppers 'obsessed' with $9 dupe of $400 cult favourite: 'Exactly the same'
articles.author: Shona Hendley
articles.summary: Woolworths is now selling Soma's amber and jasmine body wash, a dupe for Maison Francis Kurkdjian's Baccarat Rouge 540. This product is available at local Woolworths supermarkets for under $20, while it typically retails for $18.00 for 750ml, and was found to be on sale for $9.

articles.title: Walmart Plus: Everything you need to know about Walmart's Amazon Prime competitor
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Walmart launched Walmart+ on September 15, a subscription service offering unlimited same-day delivery for 160,000 grocery items, tech products, and household essentials. The annual subscription costs $98, undercutting Amazon Prime's $119 fee, and includes perks like discounts on gas and touch-free checkout via the Walmart app.

articles.title: 36 Products For Anyone Who's All 'I'm Too Old For This'
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Dr. Melaxin introduced "Peel Shot," an exfoliating K-beauty product. Gold Bond launched firming neck and chest cream. Lumify is selling Eye Drops on Amazon. Good Molecules offers Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel for reducing eye puffiness. Loops Quiet 2 launched earplugs designed to muffle noise. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder to absorb oil and blur pores. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. The Pink Stuff introduced the "Sqeezy" sponge set. Biofreeze released a new Dry Stick for portable pain relief. Plackers sells disposable "Grind No More" Night Guards. L'Oreal Paris launched Collagen Moisture Filler Moisture Bounce Face Serum. Coop Home Goods sells "holy grail" pillow. Hatch launched Restore 3 sunrise alarm and sound machine. First Aid Beauty launched Ingrown Hair Pads. Clean Skin Club offers Clean Towels.

articles.title: Three things we expect to see at OpenAI's GPT-5 reveal event
articles.author: Rory Bathgate
articles.summary: OpenAI is preparing to launch its most powerful model, GPT-5, expected to surpass current models in performance. This launch follows the release and subsequent deprecation of GPT-4.5, and OpenAI aims for GPT-5 to meet high user expectations and improve upon competitor models.

articles.title: BYD's latest lifestyle and F&B space at Punggol serves up in-house roasted coffee, ceremonial-grade matcha and more, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: BYD by 1826, a brand of Chinese carmaker BYD, has launched a new experiential hub at Punggol's Waterway Point. The location features BYD cars along with a cafe offering premium beverages such as specialty coffee and matcha drinks. The brand intends to expand to 10 locations by next year.

articles.title: 27 Hair Products You'll Want To Keep Restocks Of
articles.author: Isabella Sarlija
articles.summary: L'Oreal Paris introduced a rinse-out lamellar water treatment for hair moisture and shine. Nizoral offers an anti-dandruff shampoo to control fungus and relieve itchy scalps. Crown Affair launched The Texturizing Air Dry Mousse for natural hair texture enhancement, while Squigs introduced Gooseberry Delight Hair Oil for scalp nourishment and frizz reduction. Shark released the Flexstyle hair styling system for versatile hairstyles including curls and straightening.

articles.title: X‑Design Tops Product Hunt with One-Click Lifestyle Product Photos  Aug. 8, 2025 03:01
articles.summary: X-Design, an AI product photo editor designed for small online sellers in the home décor and handmade goods space, launched publicly on Product Hunt and achieved #1 Product of the Day and #2 Product of the Week. X-Design generates realistic listing images from a single product photo, offering features like background removal, photo enhancement, and realistic scene generation to help sellers create high-quality visuals without a professional setup.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 and Flip7 review: There's a slim chance you won't like these
articles.author: Alvin R Cabral
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7. The Galaxy Z Fold7 boasts an ultra-thin profile, an 8-inch main screen, and a 200MP main camera, while the Galaxy Z Flip7 features a larger 6.9-inch main display and a 4.1-inch FlexWindow. Both models include battery improvements and are powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy.

articles.title: How long before robots become part of daily life?
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: The world's first '6S' robotics store opened in Shenzhen, showcasing robots performing tasks like dancing, massage, and snack preparation. Shenzhen Deyee Medtech Co plans to launch medical robots for use in hospitals and aims to develop more affordable household items, potentially lowering prices from over 100,000 yuan to around 30,000 yuan.

articles.title: Introducing GPT-5: Smarter, sharper, and more sarcastic
articles.author: Hal Crawford
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5, an upgraded AI model with improved coherence, accuracy, and personalized settings. The model boasts a significant reduction in factual errors and hallucinations compared to previous versions and offers a more unified user experience. It was tested for tasks like marketing idea generation and article writing, showing strengths in originality and writing quality, but with occasional issues like hallucination.

articles.title: A portable blender has been released that allows you to easily enjoy soft-particle slush or shaved i..
articles.author: Choi Ki-Sung
articles.summary: Lock & Lock's subsidiary, Jennifer Room, launched the 'Blend Rush,' a wireless portable blender featuring DC 540 motor technology and asymmetric blade design. The blender boasts a detachable motor and blade for easy cleaning and utilizes a USB-C charging terminal with LED indicators for operation and battery status. It also uses BPA free material for the beverage directly touches.

articles.title: Boost Your Search Rankings with Distinct Image Landing Pages
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Wayfair utilizes effective image landing pages to improve furniture SEO. Their strategy involves high-quality images, detailed descriptions, customer reviews, and clear calls to action to optimize for visual search and drive transactional intent. This approach results in prominent ranking on Google Images.

articles.title: Experience Pool Perfection at Home -- Free Trials of iGarden's High-Tech Pool Innovations Now Available in California  Aug. 8, 2025 01:00
articles.summary: iGarden, a brand from Fairland Group, has launched its "Free Pool Perfection Experience" campaign in California, allowing pool owners to test the K Pro 150 pool cleaner and Swim Jet P Series at home. The campaign offers two trial experiences and a 25% discount is available on the iGarden Pool Cleaner K Pro 150.

articles.title: High-tech Beijing district opens an all-service robot store
articles.summary: A government-run Robot Mall in Beijing E-Town is opening as a 4S store to commercialize humanoid robots. The facility allows robotics companies to display their products and collect customer feedback, aiming to facilitate the mass production and adoption of humanoid robots.

articles.title: Young entrepreneurs let dreams take flight amid China's innovation drive
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
org: Beijing Subway Line 10 Youth Entrepreneurship Village
articles.summary: Glacier Wisdom has created the AI Power Box, an AI-powered psychological health product designed to offer emotional support through a digital friend. Additionally, Dream Lab is assisting a student in developing a smart teacup that displays temperature and automatically selects brewing methods, showcasing the innovative environment fostering new product development.

articles.title: Narwal Flow Debuts: Advanced Self-Clean Track-Mopping AI Robot Vacuum
articles.summary: Narwal launched the Narwal Flow, a robot vacuum and mop featuring FlowWash Mopping System, Twin-AI Dodge Obstacle Avoidance, and CarpetFocus Technology. Pre-sales started on August 7, 2025, with discounts available on both the Water Tank and Compact versions of the Narwal Flow.

articles.title: With OpenAI GPT-5, Social Media Users Have An All-In-One AI Creation Tool
articles.author: John Brandon
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched GPT-5, an upgrade to its previous AI chatbot models. GPT-5 features a more casual and human-like tone, improved content planning capabilities, and aims to assist content creators by generating better captions and content calendars. While image generation might still need improvement, the chatbot is a step towards becoming an all-in-one content creation tool.

articles.title: TaylorMade introduces first fully forged wedge range
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: TaylorMade is launching its new Milled Grind 5 wedges, making them available for retail.

articles.title: ChatGPT users hate GPT-5's 'overworked secretary' energy, miss their GPT-4o buddy
articles.author: Ars Technica
articles.summary: OpenAI released its new GPT-5 model family this week. The company is working to roll out the new AI to everyone, promising massive upgrades.

articles.title: I tried this wearable air conditioner during a heatwave – it was a total saviour
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Sony introduced the Reon Pocket Pro. This device represents a new product offering from Sony.

articles.title: Kehlani Launches Free Laundry Service for Moms in Major U.S. Cities
articles.author: The Source
articles.summary: Kehlani launched 'Nini's Fluff & Fold,' a new service that provides free laundry services to mothers.

articles.title: Nintendo's new toddler range includes cute wooden Mario blocks that double as amiibo, but the ...
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Nintendo is expanding its product line into the baby and toddler market. The company is introducing a new range of toys and clothing aimed at this demographic.

articles.title: Narwal Flow Debuts: Advanced Self-Clean Track-Mopping AI Robot Vacuum
articles.author: St Albans Messenger
articles.summary: The product features an advanced FlowWash Mopping System. Twin-AI Dodge Obstacle Avoidance provides intelligent automation. CarpetFocus Technology enhances cleaning performance.

articles.title: LEPAS L4 Makes Its Overseas Debut, Opening a New Gateway to "Exquisite Life and Self-pleasing ...
articles.author: Bennington Banner
articles.summary: Smart launched L4, its debut model, marking the introduction of a new product.

articles.title: DJI enters smart home market with its first robotic vacuums
articles.author: Shenzhen Daily
articles.summary: DJI launched its ROMO series of robotic vacuum cleaners, marking its entry into the smart home appliance market. The ROMO product line combines sweeping and mopping functionalities, leveraging DJI's proprietary technology. This represents DJI's strategic expansion from aerial intelligence to home cleaning.

articles.title: When games get hungry: The oddest food partnerships in gaming history
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Campbell's and Pokémon have partnered to introduce a new soup product aimed at kids. The soup features Pokémon characters like Pikachu and Bulbasaur on its packaging.

articles.title: ‘Super Robot Wars Y' Gets A Demo And A Shiny New Trailer
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Super Robot Wars Y is releasing at the end of this month. A demo and new trailer have been released.

articles.title: Experience Pool Perfection at Home -- Free Trials of iGarden's High-Tech Pool Innovations Now Available ...
articles.author: Missoulian
articles.summary: iGarden, a new garden robotics brand, has been introduced. The company aims to revolutionize gardening through robotics.

articles.title: Philippines' first fully app-based mobile service for Gen Z launched
articles.author: Sun Star
articles.summary: KiQ, a new mobile brand, is launching the Philippines' first fully app-based telco service. This service offers a personalized digital experience tailored to Gen Z mobile users, giving them more control and freedom.

articles.title: Taking a look back at a legacy of innovation
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: LG is showcasing its technological advancements through the LG Heritage Lounge in Changwon, South Korea, and the Goldstar Refresh Center in Seoul. The LG Heritage Lounge displays 60 years of LG's home appliance technology and AI-powered solutions. The Goldstar Refresh Center, in collaboration with Starbucks, features interactive exhibits, smart appliances, and products like the LG Styler.

articles.title: Chick-fil-A Unveils New Fall Menu Items
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A launched a new limited-time menu on August 18, featuring the Cherry Berry & Sprite seasonal soda line, the Pretzel Cheddar Club Sandwich, and two new Waffle Potato Chip varieties. The Pretzel Cheddar Club Sandwich, previously tested in Raleigh, N.C., features a pretzel bun, cheddar cheese, bacon, and Creamy Dijon Mustard Sauce and will now be available nationwide due to guest demand. The waffle cut style chips are a permanent side item and catering option.
